attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for lifers, horrendous crimes, rapist, paedophiles
attributes.background: For those scientifically proven to be guilty of murder, Rape, paedophiles (singular or gang) to be given the death penalty... I am sick to death of reading such horrific crimes getting silly sentences with the chance of release. These vile people should never be aloud out to walk the streets again.
